# Icons design

> Powered by [Fontello](http://fontello.com).

## Icon with title

``` html hl_lines="4 5"
<!-- ./index.html -->

<vue-goodshare-facebook
  title_social="Facebook"
  has_icon
></vue-goodshare-facebook>
```
